oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Truan. J. David Truan house.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: House of J. David Truan, built 1861. L-r: Bouncer the dog, J. David Truan, Elsie Rochat Truan, Ellen Truan Clark, Louis C. Truan, Marguerite Truan Mynatt. Ca. 1903. Standing in yard with two chairs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Swiss Americans, dwellings, cabins, families, furnishings, chairs
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
